name: unmelodious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not melodious (= pleasant to listen to): This bird has a distinctive, shrill, and unmelodious call. It's an understatement to say that his singing is unmelodious - he's practically tone deaf.
More examplesFewer examplesThe supporters broke into a loud, drunken, and particularly unmelodious rendition of the national anthem.I found it extremely hard to listen to the unmelodious tones of the priest whose sermon seemed to be never-ending.Despite the unmelodious cacophony in the streets from all the celebrating fans pressing their car horns, I still found the sheer noise uplifting.
